评论详情: I loved this dress, but for a 5'3" person it came well below the knees which is personally unflattering. I don't have the money to get it altered or I'd definitely keep it. I really need a dress to come TO or RIGHT ABOVE the knees to look good on me. I really do love the stretchiness of the bodice, the zipper is good... I wish it had pockets like the spaghetti strap version (which I actually had MORE problems with). the fabric is lovely. if it fit me right, I'd keep it, but it's just too long for me and I don't have a way to fix that.

I am happy to say this dress is true to size! — unlike some other retro style dresses on Amazon that run small. This sizing chart has a range of an inch or two couple for the bust, waist, and hips. The dresses that don’t fit as well just have one measurement. It might say 36” for the bust, instead of 36-37.” There’s some forgiveness in the waist.  I wear medium, but bought a medium and a large, because I wasn’t sure of the sizing. The medium fit just right. This dress makes me look as if I have an hourglass figure (I do not!) I just pulled the dress on, didn’t even use the zipper.  Something I really like about the straps is they use a design strategy also in some of my bras. The backs of the straps are angled inward a little bit toward the center of the back — just enough so the straps don’t fall down. Most dresses and bras have the straps even in the front and the back, and the strap can fall down, but if the back is angled inward a bit like this, they can’t fall down. Yay!  The leaf pattern is gorgeous. The smocking in the back helps the dress bodice fit just right, the fabric is beautiful and the length is flattering, fresh and breezy. FYI— I do not have a perfect figure. I have a big rib cage, a tummy, and a few rolls. You can’t tell any of that with this dress design — the waist of the dress is a little higher than my waist, so it skims above the waist — very flattering. It’s made well. There’s a lining, so you don’t need a slip.  To the manufacturer - One thing that would make it better: Please add pockets! I think they would work well with this design.

I bought this dress for an anniversary, but it could be easily worn to a party or summer get-together. The fabric flows well ans the dress has gathered elastic on the sides of the waist for a comfortable fit and really nice lines. No bulges!  I tried on a number of dresses. This was my favorite for size, pattern, fabric, and style.  Only downside: it does not have pockets.
Size was perfect for me 5’2”. Wore it to a tea party shower. Quality was good.

I have this dress in 6 different prints, all bought before the manufacturer switched from cotton to polyester. The cotton held its shape well, was very comfortable, wouldn't cling, and I always got a ton of compliments whenever I wore it. All of the polyester versions I've tried have been such a terrible substitute that I've returned them all.
Great light summer dress.
I just love this dress. I’ve worn it a couple of times now. I intend to wear it to a 50’s party this winter. I live in Florida.  I suggest you purchase a tiered slip to enhance the design.

Wore this dress on vacation out to dinner. I received TONS of compliments. I felt so feminine and cute in the dress. I purchased the tulle underskirt on Amazon as well. I'm 5'8 220s I wear 42DDD size 14-16. I bought a size XL and it fit very well.
Beautiful dress, but it runs tight through the chest area. I suggest go up a size if you are a busty woman.
Heavyweight keeps the dress from blowing up in wind. Love the Mid-century look.

Bought this on Prime Days. It’s a cute dress. Fabric feels a little cheap, but ca5 complain for the price. Ordered the XL but could have gone with a Large - size 14, 38D. The body of the dress is a bit long, but not too noticeable. My daughter is 5’3, so if you’re taller or long waisted it shouldn’t be a problem.  Seems to be wrinkle resistant. While it’s polyester, it is thin and not clingy. It’s very flattering, works well for a pear-shape body.

This dress came today and it fits PERFECTLY!!! I've only tried it on, but I can't wait to wear it out for the day. It's a perfect summer dress that can be dressed up for an evening outing or for just running errands during the day. I think I'll wear it tomorrow while taking care of a few errands!
I love this dress and wear it a lot. Fits well and is super cute.

Wore  this to a tea party and it got lots of compliments. Very soft and girly.
This dress looks so amazing on. It is the right fit and very comfortable. I like the material. It is not cheap or flimsy. It is durable.  It arrived timely and in secure packaging.

I'm in love with this dress and bought another in the strawberry design. This is great for work and being a larger breasted woman, this worked great for me. Very comfortable to wear all day and I got several compliments.
Fabric is vibrant and I always get compliments. Washing it has been no problem since last fall. Straps are comfortable and zipper is strong. Great price. Not see through.

I receive compliments every time I wear this dress.  I am size 14 and went with a size L.  It's a little snug just under the bust BUT does fit me well & compliments my shape.  I have a small bust but wide shoulders. If my bust was larger, I would have gone to XL.  It washes well.

评论概述: I wish size was not off

I am 5 ft and 120, I could have kept it and used a belt and taken in the shoulder straps but for the price, I felt I deserved a proper fit. I am not even sure I received a small because there was no size displayed on the tag of the dress. Maybe I was mistakenly sent a larger size.

I have bought several 1950s dresses off Amazon and returned most of them for quality issues. Belle poque as a brand in whole is fantastic. The dresses are true to size, the material is durable but not too heavy and doesn't come out of the package all wrinkled and requiring pressing.  I wore this dress for my 1950s house wife themed bridal shower. It fit perfect, was comfortable and material had some stretch to it which made sizing that much easier, but also zippered if needed. My cardigan was also Belle Poque. I am 5"4 170lbs and a 36 DD bust I got the XL but probably could have went one size smaller. I am also wearing a crinoline skirt under the dress but wasn't necessarily needed.
Super cute dress.  Didn't realize it was elastic in the back. Could have ordered a smaller size.  But does fit well
Beautiful

I ordered a XL. This dress is very flattering and is super comfy! My only suggestion is the buttons should be all black. The buttons are white with a black cloth topping. Since the buttons don’t lay flat, you can see the white plastic of the buttons a bit. Also the neckline is a little loose. Over all I love the dress and I’ve already gotten a ton of compliments while wearing it!
Very nice
I love the smocking.  It’s super comfortable.  I got lots of compliments.
Super cute pattern, needs better sewing in top.  Darts would be good to give some shape.

I got this for a cruise bc it was tropical. It fit so well when the gowns I brought looked awful I decided to wear this for formal night. I dressed it up with a short jacket and pearls and it was very nice for photos. If I didn’t have this I would not have had anything to look respectable on formal night. You can count on this style dress for anything and especially since it is flattering to one’s figure. Grateful for this dress.

It's a very lovely dress. I enjoy the fabric it isn't scratchy or feels cheap. The length is lovely,  it's passed my knees so I'm not tripping on anything but I know everything is covered. I could have sized down but being the size I am I tend to go larger. I enjoy however the stretchy material on the sides as I know if I did get a size smaller that stretch gives it some room. Overall very good and I definitely plan to order another one!
Very nice dress and material. I had to return since the waist is a bit high for me, I prefer a lower waist.
I'm 158 cm and weight 63 kg and the Small fitted me perfectly. I love the weight of the dress and how fresh it is. Is on the thick side and little bit long.
Does not look retro. Just a sundress. Also runs very small
This dress is adorable. Fits perfectly.

Love the colors, look, quality and material. Fit pretty much as expected. A little tight at the waist for me and loose in the chest. But still looks good. Not sheer, more opaque- able to wear with light colored bra/underwear, no slip needed.

I rolled my eyes when I bought this dress, came in the next day, and fit AMAZING. Fabric is fabulous, thick enough not to look cheap but thin enough to keep you cool in Florida. The bust area is so flattering on my C cup chest. I literally ran to the computer to order 3 more of them in the other colors.

VERY cute dress. Fits well and has just enough stretch around the waist to make it comfy. The skirt length is great—I’m 6ft and it hits just below my knees. Love that!! I think it’s a bit more sheer than I was expecting, but overall I like it very much.
Got it for Via Las Vegas it was perfect . Packed nice , hung up day before wearing it was ready to go for pool party and car show lots of compliments.
This dress was perfect for my 50's themed event.  It was well made, sized correctly. I got many compliments.

评论概述: How satisfy I am with the product.
评论详情: I liked the style and fitting but for an older person your dresses should be regular length which should be below your knee.
The quality and fit of this dress are exquisite!  It is true to size and the material is high quality.  It is a flattering dress.  I just wish the bottom half of the dress was lined.

This is a great dress for the price. I paid 35$ plus tax. It's stretchy and will fit a bigger bust really well. It is flowy and all the folds just fall perfectly. The prints are super cute. I tried a petticoat underneath but must say it really doesn't need it. It falls wide enough by itself. The material is thin but sturdy. I'd say some of the buttons might need to be reinforced as I noticed some have some loser thread. The material is only died on the outside and is white on the inside. This dress is true to size.
Very well made.  Not see through.  Has nice fit, and my wife says it's very comfortable.  I love when I successfully buy a dress she likes and it fits perfect.
Wish it had pockets but extremely comfortable and well put together considering the price. Tons of compliments at a summer birthday party this weekend and kept me nice and cool in the heat.
Good quality fabric im usually a small and ordred medium, it fit fine but could have gone with a small as well
The Amazon suggestion said to order an XXL but definitely look at the size guide. I ordered a large and it was perfect everywhere!
I was shocked at how nice this dress was, quality was through the roof and fit was perfect !
I got so many compliments on this dress. I loved the fit and material. I ordered the large and exchanged it for the medium. I’m 5’ 4” 160 pounds for reference
So perfect true to size very comfortable and beautiful

I wear an XL and the item states fits as expected. I would have to send it to a seamstress for it to fit at all.  SO INCREDIBLY FRUSTRATED -China sizes are so hit and miss. I loved this pattern and I would have returned and gotten a size larger but that wasn't possible.

This dress fit like a dream the first second I looked at it. BUT, as I was setting into the bodice the right front was cut too shallow on the side and sat below half my bra. No amount of shifting would make it fit. The left side was also shallow but not by as much. The side bodice on both sides puckered where there should have been darts to fit. No smoothing that out. I could have possibly added darts, but I can’t add fabric to an improperly cut/designed bodice. Smaller sizes may fit fine, but this is an example of a small size that was computer designed to simply get bigger with no regard for the a large fit. It’s a shame because otherwise it fit fine and was slamming cute.
I was hoping that this dress would have pockets as summer dresses are worn so casually that usually I don't carry a purse.

评论概述: Gorgeous dress, well made, flattering cut. High quality, stretchy material
评论详情: Gorgeous dress, well made, flattering cut. High quality, stretchy material. Wore this to a production of Grease and got TONS of compliments. Dress was comfortable and flattering. Buying one in every color!

I’m 5’4 105 lbs and a 34c. I purchased the small, and it fits well. This dress is so cute and I’m *old. But idc I wear what I want whenever I want. I love fashion and this dress feels so classy and so 50*s. I highly recommend the pineapple print. You won’t be disappointed. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

评论概述: Adorable but not consistent with other Belle Poque Dresses
评论详情: Really, I would give this dress 4 and a half stars if I could. I love Belle Boque dresses. This is the fourth dress in this style I have purchased. All different patterns. This dress, however, runs significantly larger from waist up and the material is different. I am 5'10, normally with small top (36 B). The other dresses fit perfect in XL but this one had about 2 inches of extra fabric up top so had to return for size Large which fit better but still slightly loose in shoulders. Also, the material is different. While the other three dresses (plain black with roses on collar line, strawberry print and rose print) are all a blend of cotton spandex this is 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane. I don't mind, it's still beautiful but just seems a bit lower in quality (this is where I cut a half-star in my rating), and has a sleeker feel, with a slight shine. The skirt is very, very full so plenty of room for a petticoat if you wanted to add. It hits me just below the knee so for those who aren't tall it will likely hit mid-calf. I would recommend this dress. So much fun. I'll be wearing it to a vintage trailer rally that I attend.
I love how A-line dresses compliment my figure and this dress is no exception. Would definitely buy again
Super comfortable. It’s a little to long for my taste but I love it.

I usually get the size in all my 50s dresses that match the chart. I couldn't breath in this dress. The sizing was off, way off. Also, I discovered where the bodice hits the main skirt is too high. It has elastic on the bodice, but that doesn't help with the seam separating the bodice and skirting. If I wanted another, If it was an inch longer in that bodice area, it wouldn't have been an issue. Height and weight aren't the issue. The issue is/was the length of the bodice and their measurements not being accurate. Go a size or 2 up if you want to breath.
Dress is beautiful however, I've gained lots of weight and just don't feel comfortable in this style dress.

I love it, but I only bought it to breastfeed in.  So if I hold onto this, I can't really wear it for over a year. This is a really lovely dress. It fits nicely and the fabric is substantial without being heavy. I used it as a costume in my performances and got all kinds of compliments. The fabric is a nice blend and it travels well, picking up only a few minor wrinkles. My only issue with it is that the sleeves don’t stay up, but I think the problem is that I am abnormally short and a normal size human will not have this problem. If you like these kind of dresses, I think you will love this one because it is lovely with or without a crinoline and it’s perfect for summer parties or every day wear.

I've had so many compliments from this dress already and I've only worn it twice so far. I've been directing people to Amazon to get one of their own.  It fits true to size- It washes well, I have it air dry in case - the pattern is beautiful and material doesn't seem to wrinkle. The length is just right and I especially love the little attentions to detail such as the button accessories. I will definitely purchase more!

This dress looks very structured and fitted online, but the reality is that it needed a lot alterations to fit me.  I adjusted the straps and added two large darts in the back of the waist.
